pageContext.claim: “Trump with women. Remember the last election? 'Well, Donald Trump won't do very well with women.' I did great with women.  I did great. Right? I did great with women. In fact, at the end, when I won, they -- they said, 'You know, a statistic we got wrong, women really came out for Trump.'”
pageContext.analysis: Trump lost the women's vote to Hillary Clinton. Trump appears to be citing the exit-poll results only for white women, in which he got 52 percent. But for all women, exits polls show he received only 41 percent. Clinton received the votes of 54 percent of all women.
